S04n464:1: bhūtapūrva bhikṣavo'tīte'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairaprameyairacintyairaparimitairapramāṇaistataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt-tena kālena tena samayena mahābhijñājñānābhibhūrnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstāḥ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān saṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau mahārūpe kalpe |
S04n464:3: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo yāvāniha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S04n464:6: atha khalu sa puruṣastasmāllokadhātorekaṃ paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātusahasramatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet |
S04n464:7: atha sa puruṣo dvitīyaṃ ca paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā tataḥ pareṇa parataraṃ lokadhātusahasramatikramya dvitīyaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet |
S04n464:8: anena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāvantaṃ pṛthivīdhātumupanikṣipet pūrvasyāṃ diśi |
S04n464:9: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ śakyaṃ teṣāṃ lokadhātūnāmanto vā paryanto vā gaṇanayādhigantum?
S04n464:12: bhagavānāha-śakyaṃ punarbhikṣavasteṣāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ kenacid gaṇakena vā gaṇakamahāmātreṇa vā gaṇanayā paryanto'dhigantum,
S04n464:15: na tveva teṣāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śakyaṃ gaṇanāyogena paryanto'dhigantum |
S04n464:19: taṃ cāhaṃ bhikṣavastathāgataṃ tāvacciraṃ parinirvṛtamanena tathāgatajñānadarśanabalādhānena yathādya śvo vā parinirvṛtamanusmarāmi ||
S04n464:20: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n464:29: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pi ca eva nikṣipet
S04n464:30: sarvaṃ pi so nikṣipi taṃ rajogatam |
S04n464:44: smarāmi vṛttaṃ yatha adya śvo vā ||6 ||
S04n464:50: pūrve ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñānābhibhūstathāgato'nabhisaṃbuddho'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragrata eva sarvāṃ mārasenāṃ prābhañjīt parājaiṣīt |
S04n464:51: prabhañjayitvā parājayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmiti na ca tāvattasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma |
S04n464:55: tṛtīyamapi caturthamapi pañcamamapi ṣaṣṭhamapi saptamamapi aṣṭamamapi navamamapi daśamamapyantarakalpaṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle bodhimaṇḍe'sthāt sakṛdvartanena paryaṅkena antarādavyutthitaḥ |
S04n464:57: na ca tāvadasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma ||
S04n464:58: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya devaistrāyastriṃśairmahāsiṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūd yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa,
S04n464:59: yatra sa bhagavān niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:60: samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca khalu punastasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe,
S04n464:62: bodhimaṇḍasya parisāmantakena yojanaśatamantarikṣe ca vātān pramuñcanti,
S04n464:64: yathāpravarṣitaṃ ca tat puṣpavarṣaṃ tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya avyucchinnaṃ pravarṣayanti |
S04n464:66: tathā pravarṣitaṃ ca tatpuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣayanti yāvat parinirvāṇakālasamaye tasya bhagavatastaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti |
S04n464:68: tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya satkārārthamavyucchinnaṃ pravādayāmāsuḥ paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpān tasya bhagavato niṣaṇṇasya |
S04n464:69: tata uttari tāni divyāṇi tūryāṇi satatasamitaṃ pravādayāmāsuryāvattasya bhagavato mahāparinirvāṇakālasamayāt ||
S04n464:70: atha khalu bhikṣavo daśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:71: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhaṃ ca taṃ viditvā ye tasya bhagavataḥ kumārabhūtasya ṣoḍaśa putrā abhūvannaurasāḥ,
S04n464:73: teṣāṃ ca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśānāṃ rājakumārāṇāmekaikasya ca vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakānyabhūvan vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni |
S04n464:74: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāstāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakāni visarjayitvā,
S04n464:75: taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā,
S04n464:76: mātṛbhirdhātrībhiśca rudantībhiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ tena ca mahārājñā cakravartinā āryakeṇa mahākośena rājāmātyaiśca bahubhiśca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ yena bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataḥ,
S04n464:78: tasya bhagavataḥ satkārārthāya gurukārārthāya mānanārthāya pūjanārthāya arcanārthāya apacāyanārthāya upasaṃkrāntāḥ |
S04n464:79: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya añjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhiḥ sārūpyābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma—
S04n464:86: na ca te'ntarā kāyu kadāci cālito
S04n464:107: śaraṇaṃ ca tvā eti vrajāma nātha ||14 ||
S04n464:108: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva bālakāḥ,
S04n464:109: taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhimukhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamābhiḥ sārūpyabhīrgāthābhiḥ saṃmukhamabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣante sma dharmacakrapravartanatāyai-deśayatu bhagavān dharmam,
S04n464:110: deśayatu sugato dharmaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S04n464:120: caryāṃ ca jñānaṃ pi ca sarva jānasi
S04n464:124: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyamānena daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitānyabhūīvan,
S04n464:126: sarveṣu ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu yā lokāntarikāstāsu ye akṣaṇāḥ saṃvṛtā andhakāratamisrāḥ yatra imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau evaṃmahaujaskau ābhayāpyābhāṃ nānubhavataḥ,
S04n464:130: te'pyanyonyamevaṃ paśyanti anyonyamevaṃ saṃjānanti-anye'pi bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ santīhopapannāḥ |
S04n464:131: anye'pi bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ santīhopapannāḥ iti |
S04n464:132: sarveṣu ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu yāni devabhavanāni devavimānāni ca,
S04n464:134: mahatā cāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan atikramya devānāṃ devānubhāvam |
S04n464:135: iti hi bhikṣavastasmin samaye teṣu lokadhātuṣu mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya mahataśca audārikasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo'bhūt ||
S04n464:136: atha pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni,
S04n464:139: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāmetadabhavat-imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti aujasvīni ca |
S04n464:141: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S04n464:143: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sarvasattvatrātā nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n464:156: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S04n464:157: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu dikṣvanucaṃkramanto'nuvicarantaḥ paścimaṃ digbhāgaṃ prakrāntāḥ |
S04n464:158: adrākṣuḥ khalu punasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇaḥ paścime digbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ,
S04n464:161: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiśca sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma,
S04n464:164: abhyavakīrya tāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ-parigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni asmākamanukampāmupādāya |
S04n464:166: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhiḥ sārūpyābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma—
S04n464:179: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānabhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantametadūcuḥ-pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram,
S04n464:184: deśayatu bhagavān dharmasvāmī dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ |
S04n464:185: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ||
S04n464:186: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta—
S04n464:191: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayati sma ||
S04n464:192: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena pūrvadakṣiṇe digbhāge teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni,
S04n464:193: tānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca |
S04n464:194: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ brahmaṇāmetadabhavat-imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca |
S04n464:196: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S04n464:198: atha khalu bhikṣavo'dhimātrakāruṇiko nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n464:206: na khalvetādṛśaṃ pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ jātu dṛśyate ||29 ||
S04n464:209: atha khalu bhikṣavastānyapi pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni svāni svāni divyāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu dikṣvanucaṃkramanto'nuvicaranta uttarapaścimaṃ digbhāgaṃ prakrāntāḥ |
S04n464:210: adrākṣuḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇa uttarapaścime digbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭa parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ,
S04n464:212: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryena sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenopasaṃkrantāḥ |
S04n464:213: upasaṃkramya ca tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma,
S04n464:214: abhiprakiranti sma taṃ ca bodhivṛkṣaṃ daśayojanapramāṇam |
S04n464:215: abhyavakīrya tāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ-parigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyasmākamanukampāmupādāya |

S04n464:234: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantametadūcuḥ-pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram |

S04n464:251: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti,

S04n464:255: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S04n464:257: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sudharmo nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata—

S04n464:293: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhyāṃ sārūpyābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta—
S04n464:302: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayati sma |
S04n464:310: atha khalu bhikṣava ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni,
S04n464:311: tānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca |
S04n464:312: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāmetadabhavat-imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti ojasvīni ca |
S04n464:314: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S04n464:316: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n464:322: śrutaṃ ca keno tatha pūrva āsīt |
S04n464:328: yadi vā bhaved buddha kadāci loke ||46 ||
S04n464:329: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
S04n464:330: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu dikṣvanucaṃkramanto'nuvicaranto yena adhodigbhāgastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
S04n464:331: adrākṣuḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇo'dhodigbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ,
S04n464:334: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma,
S04n464:335: abhiprakiranti sma taṃ ca bodhivṛkṣaṃ daśayojanapramāṇam |
S04n464:336: abhyavakīrya tāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ-pratigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyasmākamanukampāmupādāya |
S04n464:338: atha khalu bhikṣavaste'pi mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma—
S04n464:340: tradhātukasmi buddhā vai sattvānāṃ ye pramocakāḥ ||47 ||
S04n464:343: śūnyā acintiyāḥ kalpā atītāḥ pūrvi ye abhū |
S04n464:347: divyāḥ kāyāśca hīyante cyutā gacchanti durgatim |
S04n464:348: aśrutvā dharma buddhānāṃ gatyeṣāṃ bhoti pāpikā ||51 ||
S04n464:350: sukhaṃ vinaśyatī teṣāṃ sukhasaṃjñā ca naśyati ||52 ||
S04n464:360: vayaṃ ca sarvasattvāśca agrāṃ bodhiṃ spṛśemahi ||57 ||
S04n464:361: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantametadūcuḥ-pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram |
S04n464:367: dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ |
S04n464:368: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokanukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ||
S04n464:369: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhyāṃ sārūpyābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta—
S04n464:378: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā teṣāṃ ca ṣoḍaśānāṃ putrāṇāṃ rājakumārāṇām,
S04n464:379: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsa triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramapravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā kenacit punarloke saha dharmeṇa |
S04n464:384: pratītyasamutpādapravṛttiṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa-iti hi bhikṣavo'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S04n464:394: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
S04n464:406: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati ||
S04n464:407: sahapravartitaṃ cedaṃ bhikṣavastena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ parṣadaḥ purastāt,
S04n464:408: atha tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte ṣaṣṭeḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni |
S04n464:409: sarve ca te traividyāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
S04n464:410: punaranupūrveṇa bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dvitīyāṃ dharmadeśanāmakārṣīt,
S04n464:413: atha khalu bhikṣavastasya bhagavato mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaikaikasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni |
S04n464:414: tataḥ paścād bhikṣavastasya bhagavato gaṇanāsamatikrāntaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho'bhūt ||
S04n464:415: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva samānāḥ śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ |
S04n464:416: sarve ca te śrāmaṇerā abhūvan paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ kuśalā bahubuddhaśatasahasracaritāvino'rthinaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S04n464:417: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ-imāni khalu punarbhagavaṃstathāgatasya bahūni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi maharddhikāni mahānubhāvāni maheśākhyāni bhagavato dharmadeśanayā pariniṣpannāni |
S04n464:418: tat sādhu bhagavāṃstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'smākamanukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya dharmaṃ deśayatu,
S04n464:422: tvaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvāśayajño jānīṣe asmākamadhyāśayamiti ||
S04n464:423: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tān bālān dārakān rājakumārān pravrajitān śrāmaṇerān dṛṣṭvā yāvāṃstasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ parivāraḥ,
S04n464:425: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāmadhyāśayaṃ viditvā viṃśateḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ||
S04n464:426: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ te ṣodaśa rājakumārāḥ śrāmaṇerā udgṛhītavanto dhāritavanta ārādhitavantaḥ paryāptavantaḥ ||
S04n464:427: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān vyākārṣīdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n464:428: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śrāvakāścādhimuktavantaḥ |
S04n464:429: te ca ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerā bahūni ca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vicikitsāprāptānyabhūvan ||
S04n464:430: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamaṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇyaviśrānto bhāṣitvā vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya |
S04n464:431: tathā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhikṣavaḥ sa tathāgataścaturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi vihārasthita evāsīt ||
S04n464:432: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ pratisaṃlīnaṃ viditvā pṛthak pṛthag dharmāsanāni siṃhāsanāni prajñāpya teṣu niṣaṇṇāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ namaskṛtya taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ caturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi saṃprakāśitavantaḥ |
S04n464:433: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān ||
S04n464:434: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena smṛtimān saṃprajānastasmāt samādhervyuttiṣṭhat |
S04n464:435: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n464:437: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane,
S04n464:438: atha tāvadeva sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayāmāsaāścaryaprāptā bhikṣavo'dbhutaprāptā ime ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāḥ prajñāvanto bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāścīrṇacaritā buddhajñānaparyupāsakā buddhajñānapratigrāhakā buddhājñānāvatārakā buddhajñānasaṃdarśakāḥ |
S04n464:439: paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ |
S04n464:440: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na pratikṣepsyanti |
S04n464:444: tai khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane'yaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃprakāśito'bhūt |
S04n464:445: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhāya samādāpitānyabhūvan,
S04n464:446: sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni |
S04n464:452: ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
S04n464:454: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti |
S04n464:455: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
S04n464:456: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukūṭaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:457: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:458: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nityaparinirvṛtaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:459: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:460: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:461: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavastamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukalpaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:462: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:463: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n464:464: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ ||
S04n464:465: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyasmābhiḥ samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n464:472: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni?
S04n464:473: yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan ||
S04n464:474: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
S04n464:477: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
S04n464:478: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
S04n464:480: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti |
S04n464:484: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
S04n464:485: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
S04n464:486: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati |
S04n464:487: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā,
S04n464:489: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām-dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
S04n464:491: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram |
S04n464:492: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya |
S04n464:493: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām |
S04n464:495: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet- yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ-vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ |
S04n464:498: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet-mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti |
S04n464:500: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt |
S04n464:501: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet- mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa,
S04n464:505: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam |
S04n464:509: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ-muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt |
S04n464:511: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
S04n464:515: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet |
S04n464:516: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet-āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ |
S04n464:518: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti ||
S04n464:519: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yuṣmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca deśikaḥ |
S04n464:520: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evaṃ paśyati-mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam |
S04n464:521: mā khalvime ekameva buddhajñānaṃ śrutvā draveṇaiva pratinivartayeyuḥ,
S04n464:524: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,
S04n464:525: viśrāntānāṃ caiṣāmevaṃ kathayati-idaṃ khalu ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramiti,
S04n464:526: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve nirvāṇabhūmī sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārthaṃ deśayati saṃprakāśayati yadidaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca |
S04n464:527: yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ samaye te sattvāstatra sthitā bhavanti,
S04n464:528: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'pyevaṃ saṃśrāvayati-na khalu punarbhikṣavo yūyaṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ |
S04n464:532: api tu khalu punarūpāyakauśalyametad bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat trīṇi yānāni saṃprakāśayantīti ||
S04n464:533: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayopadarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n464:573: na tāva kālo mama dharma bhāṣitum ||69 ||
S04n464:612: ime ca sattvā bhavi sarvi eva
S04n464:614: so cā jino āṃśayu jñātva teṣāṃ
S04n464:659: dayaṃ pratyayo yena hu dharma bhāṣe |
S04n464:668: aṭavī ca sā śūnya bhaveta dīrghā
S04n464:714: samaye yadā tu sthita atra sthāne
S04n464:727: daśo balā ye ca jināna dharmāḥ |
